Class FESI.awtgui.AwtPromptBox 

FESI.awtgui.AwtPromptBox
public class AwtPromptBox
implements PromptBox
Implementation of the prompt box

AwtPromptBox(String, String, String)
Create a PromptBox with default response

waitResponse()
Wait that the user returned a response

AwtPromptBox 
 public AwtPromptBox(String title,
                     String prompt,
                     String defaultResponse)
Create a PromptBox with default response

Parameters:
title - The window title
prompt - The prompt string
defaultResponse - The default response (will be "" if null)

waitResponse 
 public synchronized String waitResponse()
Wait that the user returned a response

Returns:
the string response (may be "" but not null)
